about.details:
Incorporated in 2002, Essen Speciality Films Limited manufactures and exports specialized plastic products in the home improvement and home furnishing industry, to multinational modern trade retailers, such as IKEA, Walmart, Kmart, Bed Bath & Beyond, Rusta, Runsven, Kohl's, Kroger, etc.

The company's product list includes bath area and accessories, artificial plants & flowers, kitchen & dining, storage & organization, fitness & lifestyle, and outdoor & utility products, and customized products, which include plastic films, Spa slippers, Baby shower caps, green-house gutter sheets, etc. The company markets and sells its products predominantly under three brands; 'Draperi' for shower curtains, 'Runner' for shelf liners, and 'Paperi' for artificial plants and placemats.

They have a diversified customer base and are spread across various industries, including but not limited to home furnishing, home decor, departmental stores, discount retailers, hypermarkets, hardware, and home improvement, office supplies stores, agricultural and medical industry, and international importers and wholesale distributors.

The company supplies its products to twenty-four (24) countries, including but not limited to, China, Saudi Arabia, the United States of America, Qatar, United Kingdom, Germany, Italy, Canada, Romania, Denmark, Poland, New Zealand, United Arab Emirates, Spain, Austria, France, Australia, Kuwait, Belgium, Austria, Sweden, and Mexico.

Essen Speciality Films has been recognized as a 'two-star export house' by the Ministry of Commerce & Industry, Government of India. And was awarded with the 'Best Supplier of the Year', twice by IKEA.

faqs.question: What is the Essen Speciality Films IPO?
faqs.answer:
Essen Speciality Films IPO is a SME IPO of 6199200 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹66.33 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹107 per share. The minimum order quantity is 1200.

The IPO opens on June 23, 2023, and closes on June 27, 2023.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Essen Speciality Films IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Essen Speciality Films IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Essen Speciality Films IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Essen Speciality Films IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Essen Speciality Films IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Essen Speciality Films IPO will open?

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Essen Speciality Films IPO?
faqs.answer: Essen Speciality Films IPO lot size is 1200, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,28,400.

faqs.question: How to apply for Essen Speciality Films IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Essen Speciality Films IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Essen Speciality Films IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Essen Speciality Films IPO will be done on Monday, July 3, 2023, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Wednesday, July 5, 2023. Check the Essen Speciality Films IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Essen Speciality Films IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Essen Speciality Films IPO listing date is on Thursday, July 6, 2023.
